comments.body: Giveaways? NO KYC today is already a dream but maybe just impose it on the users who withdraws large amount. comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: before I say what I would like to see in casinos, I want to talk about something I saw in your casino, see:and to make matters even worse, your casino doesn't have the face of the casino owner, but has the face of the advisors, I was wondering why the owner of the casino keeps hiding but didn't hide the face of the Advisors? when a person creates something, that person should take responsibility for that thing he created, he shouldn't use other people and hide it, that's not a good thing in my opinion. what's the point of the casino owner hiding and using other people's face and reputation? Does the casino owner feel ashamed of himself and his own casino?because from what i see the casino has a good design and there is no reason for the owner of the casino to hide, nowadays the casinos are licensed, which means that they operate in a legal way, therefore there is no reason for someone who is owner of some casino to hide, now when people create casino with bad intentions then it makes perfect sense not to want to show their faces. another thing i could see in your casino is that it has a token, who are the team members for that token? I also saw that the link in your coinmarketcap casino leads to coinmarketcap in Russian, that means your casino is in Russiansince russia has been placed under sanctions, i wonder how your customers will be able to use your casino without feeling afraid that someday the governments will close or punish your casino, i don't know what are all the sanctions that have been placed against russia, i hope your casino is cool. now talking about what I would like to see in the casinos, in my opinion there should be a forum in the casino itself, but that was intended for people to post their withdrawals, complaints and problems solved and how was the customer service, this would bring a lot of transparency to this online casino industry

comments.body: Quote from: dexsport.io on August 25, 2023, 12:30:48 PMWrite your wishes so that we can become better for you!I feel like you're trying to fill the niche that doesn't exist. comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: More games, a systematized KYC system so people don't get asked out of the blue to provide proof of existence or something along those lines when they want to withdraw large amounts of money. The introduction of more games and same bonus parlays wouldn't be so bad either, so that's something you might wanna take a look at as well. Plus more secure ways they can keep their money so we don't have to worry about losing it to hackers. Just make the casino experience safer and more accessible and a lot of people in here would be happy with it already. We're easy to please after all, just make sure that the basic things we want to see from a casino is met and we're over the moon already.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: An alternative to KYC. That's what I would like to see. I understand the importance of the KYC procedure but I still do not feel safe handing anyone, especially hackable, centralised platforms my government issued documents which could be used for shady purposes or worse, identity theft.Perhaps some form of special ID or a NFT ID could be used? A third party would do the KYC once and issue an NFT ID which is acceptable in all betting websites?

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: dexsport.io on August 25, 2023, 12:30:48 PMWrite your wishes so that we can become better for you!^ A few some!-User-friendly interface, for me a clean and intuitive interface that makes it easy for users to navigate, place bets, and access important information.-Live betting and watching live streaming, I did not see this in most platforms that have real-time betting options that allow users to place bets as a game or event unfolds.And the last one, of course, is that most gamblers like promotions and bonuses when it comes to attractive promotions, bonuses, and loyalty programs to reward users for their engagement will always we want.
